name: Scandinavian Almond Pastry
steps: Cream 1/2 c. butter and sifted flour. Add 2 Tablespoons water and mix well.
Divide dough into three equal parts. Dust your hands with flour and pat each part into a strip about 3 inches wide and 8-9 inches long. Place each strip 3 inches apart on a cookie sheet.
Put 1/2 c. butter, 1 c. water and almond extract in a pan, bring to boil and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in flour till smooth.
Set aside for 1-2 minutes, then add the eggs one at a time and blend well by hand after each addition.
Spread this mixture equally on top of the strips. Be careful not to go over the edge.
Bake at 35-40 minutes till top is crisp and brown. Place pan on a cooling rack and cool.
Be careful when removing from pan, use a spatula at the end.
Combine last butter, cream, almond extract and powdered sugar for frosting. Put sliced almonds on top.
